categories.title: Recent Pull Requests in the Eliza Repository

content.text: Several pull requests were recently merged in the Eliza repository. Two PRs focused on removing plugins from the monorepo: plugin-browser (PR #4406) and plugin-anthropic (PR #4427).
Feature enhancements include using a unique pglite folder if not provided (PR #4423) and adding Twitter timeline functionality (PR #4429).
Bug fixes and cleanup work included a small template fix (PR #4431), cleanup in the Twitter plugin (PR #4430), and removal of a hackish solution for copying migrations (PR #4422).

categories.title: Recent Pull Requests in the elizaOS/eliza Repository

content.text:
Several important pull requests have been submitted to the elizaOS/eliza repository recently:

1. Twitter Integration: PR #4429 adds a Twitter timeline feature, while PR #4425 provides documentation for setting up a Twitter agent.

2. CLI Improvements: PR #4435 fixes incorrect version detection to ensure the CLI shows the correct latest version.

3. Repository Maintenance: PR #4439 removes the plugin-local-ai from the monorepo, streamlining the codebase.

4. Database Enhancement: PR #4423 implements functionality to use a unique pglite folder if one is not explicitly provided, improving the default configuration.

categories.title: Recent GitHub Issues in the Eliza Framework

content.text:
Two recent issues have been reported in the elizaOS/eliza GitHub repository:

1. Issue #3745 reports a problem with the RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) functionality where the processFile method attempts to embed entire files, causing errors when processing large documents.

2. Issue #4432 is a job posting seeking a developer with experience in the Eliza framework.

From May 2-3, 2025, the elizaos/eliza repository showed significant development activity with 13 new pull requests, of which 7 were merged. The repository also received 1 new issue during this period. A total of 8 contributors were actively working on the project during these two days.

The provided source only mentions 'Top contributors for elizaOS/eliza' without providing any specific details about who these contributors are or their contributions. Without additional information, it's not possible to generate a detailed summary of the top contributors to the elizaOS/eliza project.
